title: Gamification-Enhanced Language Learning Process Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language proficiency and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Conducting language learning activities incorporating game elements in a BYOD environment. Encouraging learner participation through a combination of online platforms and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% content interaction rates in a gamified environment.
Learners apply language rules with over 75% accuracy through weekly quizzes.
Learners collaboratively complete three or more storytelling game levels through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
